Jeweled Dagger.name: 宝石匕首
Jeweled Dagger.description: 短小的金属刃身配以小巧的握柄与十字护手。这把匕首既是久经沙场战士的得力副武器，也可作为刺客盗贼的隐秘凶器。

Decorated Longsword.name: 装饰长剑
Decorated Longsword.description: 装饰着闪烁的银色浮雕花纹的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.10ZP2Bu3vnCuYMIB]。

Wand of Magic Detection.name: 搜魔魔杖
Wand of Magic Detection.description: 这把魔杖有 3 发充能。持握此魔杖时，你可以用一个动作并消耗 1 发充能以施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]。这把魔杖每天黎明时恢复 1d3 发已消耗的充能。

Immovable Greataxe.name: 不动巨斧
Immovable Greataxe.description:
这把巨斧并非魔法物品，但其斧柄内嵌有一根@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.eQNXan0zp279jDtk]。控制权杖的按钮位于持斧者触手可及之处。

你可以用一个动作按下按钮，使巨斧被魔法固定于当前位置。在你或其他生物再次按下按钮前，即便违背重力定律，斧头也不会移动。该斧最多可承受 8000 磅重量，更重的负载则会让权杖的效应失效并掉落在地。生物可用动作进行[[/check ability=str dc=30]]检定，成功则能将固定状态的斧头移动最多 10 尺。

Wand of Magic Missiles.name: 魔法飞弹魔杖
Wand of Magic Missiles.description:
这根魔杖具有 7 充能。当持握它时，你可以使用 1 个动作消耗最多 3 充能从中施展 @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]。你可以用 1 充能施展 1 环版本的法术。每多消耗 1 充能，法术的环位就将提升 1 环。

这根魔杖在每日黎明时重获 1d6 + 1 已消耗的充能。当充能数耗尽时，骰一次 [[/r 1d20]]。如果骰值为 1，魔杖将化作飞灰并被摧毁。

Silver Great Sword.name: 白银巨剑
Silver Great Sword.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +9，触及 5 尺，单一目标。命中：13(2d6+6) 点挥砍伤害外加 10(3d6) 点心灵伤害。此为魔法武器攻击。当吉斯洋基人对星界躯体中的目标（如法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TIoadMIsUKD4edXi]）造成重击时，可斩断连接目标与其物质躯体的银线，而非造成伤害。

骑士挥舞白银巨剑发动攻击。

Amulet of Proof against Detection and Lo.name: 反侦护符
Amulet of Proof against Detection and Lo.description:
奇物（需同调）

着装此护符时，你不会被侦测类魔法发现。你无法被指定为这类魔法的目标，魔法制造的探测器也无法觉察到你。

Ring of Protection.name: 防御戒指
Ring of Protection.description:
（需同调）

着装这枚戒指时，你的 AC 和豁免获得 +1 加值。佩戴者在该手持握任何物品时，为避免掉落或被缴械而进行豁免检定时，还将获得 +4 加值。

Spell Scroll: Freedom of Movement.name: 法术卷轴：行动自如
Spell Scroll: Freedom of Movement.description:
每张法术卷轴都以神秘暗语记录了一道法术。如果该法术属于你的职业法术列表，则你可以阅读该卷轴并施展其法术且无需提供任何材料构材。否则你将无法理解该卷轴。通过阅读卷轴施展的法术同样需要遵循相应法术正常的施法时间。法术施展过后，卷轴上的文字将随之消散，卷轴本身也将化作尘土。施法被打断时，卷轴并不会因此消失。

自由行动（4环）

你触碰一个自愿生物，并使目标在法术持续时间内移动时不受困难地形限制，并使任何降低目标速度，或者使目标陷入麻痹或束缚的法术或魔法效应对其无法生效。

该目标还可以花费 5 尺移动力直接从非魔法的束缚中挣脱（诸如镣铐或生物的擒抱等）。此外，目标在水下进行移动和攻击时不再受减益规则的限制。

卷轴详情

假如卷轴记载的法术在你职业的法术列表内，但其环阶超过了你目前能施展的水平，则你必须以你的施法关键属性通过一次 DC 为 14 的属性检定。如果检定失败，则卷轴上记载的法术将消失而不生效。

卷轴的稀有度、其法术的豁免 DC 和攻击加值由它所记载的法术环阶决定。

豁免 DC: 15
攻击加值: +7

法师可以如同抄录法术书上的法术一般抄录法术卷轴上的法师法术。抄录卷轴上的法术时，抄录者必须成功通过一次 DC 为 14 的智力（奥秘）检定以成功抄录。无论检定成功与否，法术卷轴都将被摧毁。

Lantern of Revealing.name: 显像提灯
Lantern of Revealing.description:
奇物

这盏带罩提灯点燃时提供 30 尺的明亮光照和其外 30 尺的微光光照。 1 品脱油可以供提灯燃烧 6 小时。处于提灯明亮光照范围内的隐形生物或物件将被其显形。你可以用一个动作降下灯罩，让提灯仅在 5 尺内提供微光光照。

Dagger of Venom.name: 淬毒匕首
Dagger of Venom.description:
使用此魔法武器进行攻击检定和伤害掷骰时获得 +1 加值。

你可以用一个动作使匕首涂上毒液。毒液存在 1 分钟，或直至你用这把武器成功命中某名生物。被击中生物必须进行一次 DC 15 的体质豁免，豁免失败则受 2d10 的毒素伤害并中毒 1 分钟。直到次日黎明前，该匕首都无法再以该方式进行使用。

Heward's Handy Haversack.name: 霍华德便利袋
Heward's Handy Haversack.description:
奇物

这个背包有三个袋子：中间一个侧面两个。每个袋都是一个异次元空间。每个侧袋可以容纳重量不超过 20 磅，体积不超过 2 立方尺的物体。中间的大袋则可以容纳重量不超过 80 磅，体积不超过 8 立方尺的物质。无论装了多少东西，背包总是重 5 磅。

向背包内放物件时使用与物体互动的规则。从背包内取出物品时需要一个动作。当你在背包里寻找某件特定物品时，该物品会被魔法放到最上面。

使用背包时有一些需要注意的事项。如果背包里装的东西超过了容量，或是背包被戳破、撕裂，则它被毁灭。背包毁灭时它所装载的东西将永远消失，但神器总会被送到其他什么地方。如果背包被内外翻转，它所装载的东西也将安全的掉落出来，但再次使用背包之前必须将它恢复原状。一名需要呼吸的生物被装入背包后，在开始窒息前还可以存活 10 分钟。

将该便利袋放入@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.aDHRuUs29SrumWfq]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.rvxGvcUzoQXVNbAu]或其他类似物品时，其产生的异次元空间将立即摧毁这两件物品并打开一扇通往星界的门扉。门产生在被放入另一件物品的前一物件所在的空间位置。任何在该门周围 10 尺内的生物将被吸入门内并送到星界位面的随机位置，随后该门关闭。这扇门只能单向通过且不能被再次打开。

Mudslick Tower.name: 泥岩高塔
Mudslick Tower.description:
奇物，极珍稀

你可以用一个动作将这个直径 1 寸的花岗岩小球放到地上，并念出它的命令语——即土族语下的 “固化(Petrification)”。小球将迅速成长成一座粗壮的高塔。它会一直保持这一形态直至你再用一个动作触碰这座高塔并再次念出它的命令语——此时，高塔会重新变回一颗至今 1 寸的花岗岩小球。如果你想以此法让其变回小球，塔中必须空无一物。

高塔的外墙上似乎全是泥疙瘩，它们在塔的表面上时隐时现，如同整座塔被一层厚厚的泥浆包裹着一般。高塔出现时，每个处于高塔范围内的生物都必须通过一次 DC15 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败就将受到 10d10 点钝击伤害。豁免成功只受半数伤害。不论豁免是否成功，生物都将被推到紧邻高塔的一处未被占据的空间内。未被穿着或携带的物件同样会受到这一伤害并自动被推开。

每当高塔展开时，泥岩高塔会自动与其接触到的环境中的自然岩石融合，如有必要还会翻滚自身以接触更多的岩石。

这座高塔每一面墙体都有 20 尺长与 30 尺高。要塞各面墙上都有箭孔，顶端则为城垛。它的内部被分为两层，其间由楼梯连通。楼梯向上最终可以达到要塞顶部的活板门。要塞被激活时，它面向你的一面上会出现一扇小门。小门只会因你的命令而开启。说出开门的命令语需要一个附赠动作。这扇门不会受到法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1nhIxh0DsJsntCfj]{敲击术}或类似魔法效应的影响（例如{@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.vZdLYfHlLcZqQ8zc]{开门钟琴}的效应）。

尽管它看上去像是石制的，但这座塔确实由精金打造，且其上方的魔法能阻止任何生物将其倾倒。它的天花板、门、以及每一面墙体都各具有 100 点生命值，免疫非魔法武器的伤害（攻城武器除外），并对任何伤害都具有抗性。在它与自然岩石融合期间，泥岩高塔免疫于一切伤害。只有法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{祈愿术}可以修复这座塔（以此施展的祈愿术被视为复制了一个 8 环或以下的法术），而每次对塔施展祈愿术能使其天花板、门、或某一面墙体恢复 50 点生命值。

Quickened Mind Crystal.name: 心灵晶体：瞬发
Quickened Mind Crystal.description:
奇物, 珍稀

这些宝石包含了一撮已结晶化的施法用魔力。心灵晶体存在许多种类，不论是哪种，它们的效果都是一次性的。

当你施展一个施法时间为 1 动作的法术时，若你持握着一枚心灵晶体，你就可以以下方所示的特殊方式来施展这个法术。你的法术同一时间只能受益于一颗心灵晶体的效应，且心灵晶体的效果与超魔法选项相冲，无法作用于同一法术上。使用后，心灵晶体会变为一枚价值 50gp 的、非魔法的宝石。

效果。 本次施法中，此法术的施法时间将改为1附赠动作。

utility.condition: 当你持握一枚心灵晶体施展一个施法时间为1 动作的法术时

Periapt of Health.name: 保健护符
Periapt of Health.description:
奇物

着装此护符时，你免疫所有疾病。如果你在此前已经感染了疾病，则疾病的效应在你着装此护符期间被压制。

Shortsword.name: 短剑
Shortsword.description: 这是一把中等大小的剑，配有坚固的护手和包裹着皮革的剑柄。这是一件用途广泛的武器，它在灵活性方面弥补了距离方面的不足。

Emerald Elemental Gem.name: 元素绿宝石
Emerald Elemental Gem.description:
奇物，非普通

这颗绿宝石蕴藏着操纵元素的能量。你可以用一个动作来打碎宝石，其效应如同你施展法术@Compendium[dnd5e.spells.1LkZvINag7KqBmDR]{召唤元素生物}一样召唤出一个@Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.namJz755U1EhvEJa]{水元素}。被打碎的宝石也将失去魔力。

Bloody Chain Mail.name: 血腥链甲
Bloody Chain Mail.description: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环编成。链甲还包括在甲胄下面穿戴的一层织物衬里，用以阻止擦伤并减缓挥击的冲击。此护甲同时还附有护手。

Iron Ingot.name: 铁锭
Iron Ingot.description: 作为金属工匠的得力助手，铁因其储量相对丰富且易于获取而备受青睐。地表铁可从陨石和捕虏体中获取，但更普遍的方式还是通过地下开采。不过必须小心保管，否则锈蚀会造成损耗。

Dragonguard.name: 龙之守护
Dragonguard.description:
穿戴此护甲时，你的护甲等级获得 +1 加值。

这件胸甲的设计中融入了黄金龙纹的图案。专为无冬城一位名叫特尔忒冈 (Tergon) 的人类英雄打造，能使穿戴者在对抗龙族喷吐武器的豁免检定中获得优势。

该护甲由贴合躯干的金属胸甲与柔软皮革组成。虽然对四肢防护较弱，但能有效保护穿戴者的要害器官，同时保持行动灵活。

Dragonguard Armor Boost.name: 龙之守护护甲强化
Dragonguard Armor Boost.description: 穿着此护甲时你的 AC 获得 +1 加值。

Potion of Supreme Healing.name: 极效治疗药水
Potion of Supreme Healing.description:
药水的红色液体在摇晃时会闪闪发光。

当你喝下这瓶药水时，你会恢复 10d4+ 20 点生命值。

Javelin of Lightning.name: 闪电标枪
Javelin of Lightning.description:
闪电金尖标枪

这把标枪是魔法武器。当你投掷它并说出命令语时，它将转变为一道 5 尺宽的闪电束，向 120 尺内的某个目标飞去。闪电经过的直线上除你和目标之外的每个生物必须进行一次 DC 13 的敏捷豁免，失败则受 4d6 的闪电伤害，成功则伤害减半。闪电束到达目标时变回标枪并对目标发动一次远程攻击。如果攻击命中，则目标将受标枪的伤害外加 4d6 的闪电伤害。

标枪的这个特性直到次日黎明前都无法再次启动，但你仍然可以把它当做普通魔法武器使用。

Extended Mind Crystal.name: 心灵晶体：延效
Extended Mind Crystal.description:
奇物，非普通

这些宝石包含了一撮已结晶化的施法用魔力。心灵晶体存在许多种类，不论是哪种，它们的效果都是一次性的。

当你施展一个施法时间为 1 动作的法术时，若你持握着一枚心灵晶体，你就可以以下方所示的特殊方式来施展这个法术。你的法术同一时间只能受益于一颗心灵晶体的效应，且心灵晶体的效果与超魔法选项相冲，无法作用于同一法术上。使用后，心灵晶体会变为一枚价值 50gp 的、非魔法的宝石。

效果。 如果法术的持续时间大于或等于 1 分钟，其持续时间翻倍，至多延长至 24 小时的持续时间。

utility.condition: 当你持握一枚心灵晶体施展一个施法时间为1 动作的法术时

Funerary Armor.name: 丧葬护甲
Funerary Armor.description:
由于这套盔甲是塔伦德 (Talhund) 的葬礼板甲，杜马松的信徒们不愿攻击穿戴者。

亡灵矮人在塔伦德墓穴中对穿戴这种护甲的人进行攻击检定时具有劣势。

Bead of Force.name: 力场珠
Bead of Force.description:
奇物

这个小型黑色球体直径 3/4 寸，重 1 盎司。通常都会有 1d4+4 颗珠子保存在一起。

你可以用一个动作把珠子扔出至多 60 尺远。珠子因冲击而爆炸并被摧毁，落点周围半径 10 尺（3m）范围内的每个生物都必须进行一次 DC15 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 5d4 的力场伤害。此外，球型的隐形力场将封闭该区域 1 分钟。任何豁免失败且完全处于范围中的生物会被困在里面。豁免成功或部分处于范围中的生物会沿着远离球型中心的方向推出范围。攻击或其他效应无法进入球型力场，但供呼吸的空气可以顺利流通。

被困在内部的生物可以用一个动作推动力场障壁，移动至多相当于该生物步行速度一半的距离。这个球型障壁也可以被拿起。无论内部的生物有多重，它的重量都只有 1 磅。

Alchemy Jug.name: 炼金壶
Alchemy Jug.description:
参考@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder.JournalEntryPage.7yykJG22FtRRTJmV]{T11.}

奇物

这种陶制壶看起来可以承装 1 加仑的液体，但无论壶中是空还是满，其重量都是 12 磅。即使壶内空无一物，摇动它时也依然会发出液体晃动的声音。

你可以用一个动作命令此壶产生下表列出液体中的一种。然后，你可以用一个动作打开壶，并以每分钟 2 加仑的速度倒出液体。壶中产生液体的体积最大值取决于你指定的液体类型。

从此壶开始生成液体到次日黎明前，它将无法再生成超过其上限的液体或是产生另一种液体。

液体名称最大体积
强酸8 盎司
基础毒药1/2 盎司
啤酒4 加仑
蜂蜜1 加仑
蛋黄酱2 加仑
油1 夸脱
醋2 加仑
淡水8 加仑
盐水12 加仑
葡萄酒1 加仑

Oil Flask.name: 油壶
Oil Flask.description:
油通常装在一个容量为 1 品脱的陶土瓶中。你可以用一个动作，将瓶中的油泼洒到你 5 英尺范围内的生物身上，或者将其抛出至 20 英尺远，使其在撞击时破碎。对目标生物或物体进行远程攻击，将油视为临时武器。

命中后，目标会被油覆盖。如果目标在油干涸前（1 分钟后）受到任何火焰伤害，则燃烧的油会额外造成 5 点火焰伤害。你也可以将一瓶油倒在地上，覆盖 5 平方英尺的区域，前提是地面平坦。

点燃后，油会燃烧 2 轮，并对任何进入该区域或在该区域结束回合的生物造成 5 点火焰伤害。每个生物每回合只能受到一次此伤害。

Distant Mind Crystal.name: 心灵晶体：远程
Distant Mind Crystal.description:
奇物，非普通

这些宝石包含了一撮已结晶化的施法用魔力。心灵晶体存在许多种类，不论是哪种，它们的效果都是一次性的。

当你施展一个施法时间为 1 动作的法术时，若你持握着一枚心灵晶体，你就可以以下方所示的特殊方式来施展这个法术。你的法术同一时间只能受益于一颗心灵晶体的效应，且心灵晶体的效果与超魔法选项相冲，无法作用于同一法术上。使用后，心灵晶体会变为一枚价值 50gp 的、非魔法的宝石。

效果。 若法术的射程为 5 尺或更远且不包含自身范围，此法术的射程变为 100 尺。若法术的射程为接触，则其射程变为 30 尺。

utility.condition: 当你持握一枚心灵晶体施展一个施法时间为1 动作的法术时

Large Collapsable Cage.name: 大型可折叠笼
Large Collapsable Cage.description:
参考@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro.JournalEntryPage.xXHsGkGDLo7YqHpD]{G6.}

该装置可在两分钟内折叠成平板状。笼体重达 500 磅，专为大型生物设计。虽然笼体大部分由铁制成，但配有秘银材质的加固横杆与铰链，内部还装有倒刺。此笼未配备锁具——客户需额外付费安装外购锁具。

Potion of Invisibility.name: 隐身药水
Potion of Invisibility.description:
这瓶药水的容器看上去像是空的，但感觉上像是装着药液。

当你饮下这瓶药水时，你获得隐形状态，持续 1 小时。效应将在你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术时提前结束。

Traveler's Clothes.name: 旅行服装
Traveler's Clothes.description: 旅行服装是为应对多种环境而设计的结实服装。

Empowered Mind Crystal.name: 心灵晶体：强效
Empowered Mind Crystal.description:

效果。 当你为法术伤害投掷时，你可以重骰最多 3 枚伤害骰，但你必须使用重骰后的结果。

Jeweler's Tools.name: 珠宝匠工具
Jeweler's Tools.description:
这些特殊工具包括从事珠宝工艺或珠宝交易所需的物品。

掌握一套工匠工具的熟练度，可让你在使用该工具进行手艺制作时，将熟练加值加入任何相关的能力检定中。每种工匠工具都需要单独的熟练项。

Silver Bracers of Archery.name: 白银射手护腕
Silver Bracers of Archery.description:
奇物，（需同调）

佩戴此护腕时，你将获得长弓与短弓的熟练项，且使用此类武器进行远程攻击时伤害掷骰获得 +2 加值。

Spell Scroll: Cone of Cold.name: 法术卷轴：寒冰锥
Spell Scroll: Cone of Cold.description:
每张法术卷轴都以神秘暗语记录了一道法术。如果该法术属于你的职业法术列表，则你可以阅读该卷轴并施展其法术且无需提供任何材料构材。否则你将无法理解该卷轴。通过阅读卷轴施展的法术同样需要遵循相应法术正常的施法时间。法术施展过后，卷轴上的文字将随之消散，卷轴本身也将化作尘土。施法被打断时，卷轴并不会因此消失。

寒冰锥（5 环）

一片冷空气从你手上迸发而出。在 60 尺锥状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d8 点冷冻伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

被该法术杀死的生物将成为一尊冰冻塑像并持续至被解冻。

升环施法效应。使用 6 环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比 5 环高一环，法术伤害就增加 1d8。

卷轴详情

假如卷轴记载的法术在你职业的法术列表内，但其环阶超过了你目前能施展的水平，则你必须以你的施法关键属性通过一次 DC 为 15 的属性检定。如果检定失败，则卷轴上记载的法术将消失而不生效。

卷轴的稀有度、其法术的豁免 DC 和攻击加值由它所记载的法术环阶决定。

豁免 DC: 17
攻击加值: +9

法师可以如同抄录法术书上的法术一般抄录法术卷轴上的法师法术。抄录卷轴上的法术时，抄录者必须成功通过一次 DC 为 15 的智力（奥秘）检定以成功抄录。无论检定成功与否，法术卷轴都将被摧毁。

Spell Scroll: Comprehend Languages.name: 法术卷轴：通晓语言
Spell Scroll: Comprehend Languages.description:
每张法术卷轴都以神秘暗语记录了一道法术。如果该法术属于你的职业法术列表，则你可以阅读该卷轴并施展其法术且无需提供任何材料构材。否则你将无法理解该卷轴。通过阅读卷轴施展的法术同样需要遵循相应法术正常的施法时间。法术施展过后，卷轴上的文字将随之消散，卷轴本身也将化作尘土。施法被打断时，卷轴并不会因此消失。

通晓语言（1 环）

你在法术持续时间内知晓你所听到所有语言的字面意义。你也可以通过触碰书写的文字来读懂其字面意义。以这种方式阅读每页文字需要花费 1 分钟的时间。

某些文字或图形的密语（比如一个奥秘符文）由于不属于书写语言一类所以无法用此法术破译。

卷轴详情

假如卷轴记载的法术在你职业的法术列表内，但其环阶超过了你目前能施展的水平，则你必须以你的施法关键属性通过一次 DC 为 11 的属性检定。如果检定失败，则卷轴上记载的法术将消失而不生效。

Careful Mind Crystal.description:

效果。 选择最多 3 个受该法术影响的生物。被选中的生物将自动成功通过该法术的豁免检定。

utility.condition: 当你持握一枚心灵晶体施展一个施法时间为1 动作的法术时

Eyes of Minute Seeing.name: 微视镜片
Eyes of Minute Seeing.description:
奇物，非普通

这种水晶镜片可以着装到眼睛上。着装该镜片时，可以更清晰的观察周边 1 尺以内的东西。在此范围内，你为搜索区域或研究物件所作，依赖视力的&Reference[investigation]检定具有优势。

Ring of Mind Shielding.name: 心灵护盾戒指
Ring of Mind Shielding.description:
(Requires attunement)

While wearing this ring, you are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts, determine whether you are lying, know your alignment, or know your creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with you only if you allow it.

You can use an action to cause the ring to become invisible until you use another action to make it visible, until you remove the ring, or until you die.

If you die while wearing the ring, your soul enters it, unless it already houses a soul. You can remain in the ring or depart for the afterlife. As long as your soul is in the ring, you can telepathically communicate with any creature wearing it. A wearer can't prevent this telepathic communication.

Heavy Crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
Heavy Crossbow.description: A large crossbow mounted on a sturdy block of wood which is loaded using a hand crank and fires thick steel bolts with deadly acceleration that punches through armor and flesh.

Cartographer's Tools.name: Cartographer's Tools
Cartographer's Tools.description:
These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade in cartography.

Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft. Each type of artisan's tools requires a separate proficiency.

Well Made Light Crossbow.name: Well Made Light Crossbow
Well Made Light Crossbow.description: A small crossbow with a wooden haft and a tense cord which is capable of firing a single bolt which can puncture even heavy armor at close range. The woodwork is inlaid with silver.

Calligrapher's Supplies.name: Calligrapher's Supplies
Calligrapher's Supplies.description:
These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade in calligraphy.

Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft. Each type of artisan's tools requires a separate proficiency.

Luminous War Pick.name: Luminous War Pick
Luminous War Pick.description:
Weapon (War Pick), Rare (Requires Attunement)

The haft of this war pick is inlaid with crushed pearlescent stones that imbue the weapon with a faint luminescence. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this war pick.

While wielding the war pick, you can use a bonus action to cast the @UUID[Item.s9ZNjlUlDN5fztnW]{daylight} spell, choosing a point on the war pick. Once you use this bonus action, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Illustrated Book on Ropers.name: Illustrated Book on Ropers
Illustrated Book on Ropers.description: A book containing historical accounts, information pertaining to a particular field of lore, myth, or legend.

Keoghtom's Ointment.name: Keoghtom's Ointment
Keoghtom's Ointment.description:
Wondrous item

This glass jar, 3 inches in diameter, contains 4 doses of a thick mixture that smells faintly of aloe. The jar and its contents weigh 1/2 pound.

As an action, one dose of the ointment can be swallowed or applied to the skin. The creature that receives it regains 2d8 + 2 hit points, ceases to be poisoned, and is cured of any disease.

heal.condition: The ointment needs to be swallowed or applied to the skin.

Silk Rope (50 ft.).name: Silk Rope (50 ft.)
Silk Rope (50 ft.).description: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

Holy Symbol of Dumathoin.name: Holy Symbol of Dumathoin
Holy Symbol of Dumathoin.description:
A platinum holy symbol of Dumathoin through which a true believer can call forth their power and in doing so spread the faith.

Spellcasting Focus. A cleric or paladin can use a holy symbol as a spellcasting focus. To use the symbol in this way, the caster must hold it in hand, wear it visibly, or bear it on a shield.

utility.condition: Holy symbol must be clearly visible.

Antique Maps.name: Antique Maps
Antique Maps.description: A collection of historical, antique maps of the Underdark. Valuable to a historian or collector.

Barrel of Oil.name: Barrel of Oil
Barrel of Oil.description: A barrel containing about 50 flasks of oil from the supplies being brought to Phandalin.

Beholder Statuette.name: Beholder Statuette
Beholder Statuette.description: A statuette of a beholder with emeralds at the ends of the eyestalks and a huge diamond for a central eye.

Blessing of Dumathoin.name: Blessing of Dumathoin
Blessing of Dumathoin.description:
Your eyes become keen enough to pick out hidden secrets. You gain &Reference[darkvision]. If you already had darkvision, you can see in color in the dark.

In addition, you can use an action to gain &Reference[truesight] for 1 minute. Once you gain truesight in this way, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

Box of Silver Forks.name: Box of Silver Forks
Box of Silver Forks.description: Box containing a set of several silver, six-pronged forks.

Brass Dragon Scales.name: Brass Dragon Scales
Brass Dragon Scales.description: A strange, diamond-shaped plate of a brown-gold color. Each is about half the size of a human hand, light in weight, and as tough as iron.

Cape of Enlargement.name: Cape of Enlargement
Cape of Enlargement.description:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

Found in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh8brinymaze.JournalEntryPage.I8k8EFYg3y4FHCgH]{B2.}

Ancient runes are stitched in silver thread along the hem of this grayish-purple cape.

The cape has 3 charges. As a bonus action while wearing the cape, you can expend 1 of its charges to enlarge yourself, granting yourself the following benefits:

  • Your size increases by one category—from Medium to Large, for example. If there isn’t enough room for your size to increase by one category, you instead become the maximum possible size in the space available.

  • You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

  • When you hit with an attack roll using a weapon or an unarmed strike, you can add your proficiency bonus to the attack’s damage.

These benefits last for 10 minutes or until you use another bonus action to dismiss them. The cape regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

Cape of Enlargement.description:

Cask of Salted Pork.name: Cask of Salted Pork
Cask of Salted Pork.description: A cask of salted pork from the provisions being brought to Phandalin.

Bracers of Celerity.name: Bracers of Celerity
Bracers of Celerity.description:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)

This pair of lightweight bronze bracers is lined with soft, purple velvet and engraved with swirling designs.

While you’re wearing these bracers, all your speeds increase by 10 feet, and you have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the &Reference[paralyzed] or &Reference[restrained] condition on yourself.

Censer.name: Censer
Censer.description: A beautiful censer found in the goblin shrine of Cragmaw Castle.

Chalice.name: Chalice
Chalice.description: A masterfully crafted chalice found in the goblin shrine of Cragmaw Castle.

Collapsable Cage.name: Collapsable Cage
Collapsable Cage.description:
Found in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro.JournalEntryPage.y37U98syx1IS7rV4]{G3.}

It can be folded flat with 1 minute of work. It weighs 50 pounds. Although much of the cage is made of iron, it has reinforcing bars and hinges made of mithral, and inward-pointing spikes. The cage doesn’t have a lock; customers paid extra for locks manufactured elsewhere.

Dwarven Ale Mug.name: Dwarven Ale Mug
Dwarven Ale Mug.description: A Dwarven ale mug made of hammered electrum.

Emboldening Brandy.name: Emboldening Brandy
Emboldening Brandy.description:
A character who imbibes a glass of brandy receives 1 &Reference[temporary-hit-points], but a character who drinks two glasses or more within 1 hour has the &Reference[condition=poisoned]{poisoned} condition for 1 hour.

A small cask filled with an exceptional dwarven brandy. Contains the equivalent of twenty glasses.

Energized Shard.name: Energized Shard
Energized Shard.description:
The iridescent crystal spires that cover the cavern spark with magical energy.

Can be used as a spellcasting focus.

Gold Necklace with Emerald Pendant.name: Gold Necklace with Emerald Pendant
Gold Necklace with Emerald Pendant.description: A gold necklace with a fine emerald pendant.

Scroll of Fireball.name: Scroll of Fireball
Scroll of Fireball.description:
A spell scroll bears the words of a single spell, written in a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your class's spell list, you can read the scroll and cast its spell without providing any material components. Otherwise, the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell's normal casting time. Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and it crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupted, the scroll is not lost.

If the spell is on your class's spell list but of a higher level than you can normally cast, you must make a DC 12 ability check using your spellcasting ability to determine whether you cast it successfully. On a failed check, the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.

The level of the spell on the scroll determines the spell's saving throw DC and attack bonus, as well as the scroll's rarity.

Save DC: 13
Attack Bonus: +5.

A wizard spell on a spell scroll can be copied just as spells in spellbooks can be copied. When a spell is copied from a spell scroll, the copier must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence (Arcana) check. If the check succeeds, the spell is successfully copied. Whether the check succeeds or fails, the spell scroll is destroyed.

A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

attack.condition: Spell must be on the caster's spell list.

save.condition: Spell must be on the caster's spell list.

Gnawble.name: Gnawble
Gnawble.description:
See @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh7rifts0000.JournalEntryPage.Amm4kRqrWbHTf56Y#gnawbles]{Gnawbles (Far Realm Rifts Features)} for further information.

This fuzzy orb is palm-sized and bears a mouth with sharp teeth.

Goblet Set With Moonstones.name: Goblet Set With Moonstones
Goblet Set With Moonstones.description: A silver goblet set with moonstones found in the Old Tower in the Ruins of Thundertree.

Golden Earring.name: Golden Earring
Golden Earring.description: A simple golden earring set with a tiny ruby.

Golden Elf Statuette.name: Golden Elf Statuette
Golden Elf Statuette.description:
A detect magic spell reveals that the statuette is imbued with divination magic. A non-evil creature grasping the statue can ask it a question and receive a telepathic response, as though the creature had cast augury. Once a creature has asked its question and received a response, it can never activate the statuette again.

A gold statuette of an elf, wrapped in crimson cloth.

Heightened Mind Crystal.name: Heightened Mind Crystal
Heightened Mind Crystal.description:
Wondrous Item, Rare

These gemstones contain a crystallized bit of spellcasting magic. Different types of mind crystals exist, each with a different single-use effect.

When you cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action while holding a mind crystal, you can modify the spell in a specific way that has an effect described below. You can use only a single mind crystal to modify the spell, and you can’t use a mind crystal and a Metamagic option on the same spell. Once you use a mind crystal, it becomes a nonmagical gem worth 50 gp.

Effect. Choose one creature affected by the spell. That creature has disadvantage on the first saving throw it makes against the spell.

utility.condition: When you cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action while holding a mind crystal

Hew.name: Hew
Hew.description:
Whether through demonic blessing, celestial bequeathment, crazed experiment, or skillful craft, this weapon has been enhanced to bring more bloodshed by the bearer.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Runes spell out “Hew” in Dwarvish on the axe head and the rust is misleading. Hew deals maximum damage when the wielder attacks a Plant creature or an object made of wood. The axe’s creator used it for protection in the forest while he cut firewood.

Scroll of Hold Person.name: Scroll of Hold Person
Scroll of Hold Person.description:
A spell scroll bears the words of a single spell, written in a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your class's spell list, you can read the scroll and cast its spell without providing any material components. Otherwise, the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell's normal casting time. Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and it crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupted, the scroll is not lost.

If the spell is on your class's spell list but of a higher level than you can normally cast, you must make a DC 12 ability check using your spellcasting ability to determine whether you cast it successfully. On a failed check, the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.

The level of the spell on the scroll determines the spell's saving throw DC and attack bonus, as well as the scroll's rarity.

Save DC: 13
Attack Bonus: +5.

A wizard spell on a spell scroll can be copied just as spells in spellbooks can be copied. When a spell is copied from a spell scroll, the copier must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence (Arcana) check. If the check succeeds, the spell is successfully copied. Whether the check succeeds or fails, the spell scroll is destroyed.

Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target on additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd. The humanoids must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

save.condition: Spell must be on the caster's spell list.

Potion of Invulnerability.name: Potion of Invulnerability
Potion of Invulnerability.description: For 1 minute after you drink this potion, you have &Reference[damageresistance]{resistance} to all damage. The potion's syrupy liquid looks like liquefied iron.

Ironquill's Journal and Bookplate.name: Ironquill's Journal and Bookplate
Ironquill's Journal and Bookplate.description:
Found in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh7tunnelsde.JournalEntryPage.doMvucAxNgnTscja]{J2.}@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh7art000000.JournalEntryPage.epqj8hlUZJ3wuFKg]{ }

The ornate bookplate bears the name “Thorgran Ironquill, Historian.” Only the first few pages of the journal remain. They include rumors of rising mind flayer activity beneath the Sword Mountains. The journal’s author plans to spy on a mind flayer stronghold called Illithinoch deep underground. The author hopes this information will allow him to warn nearby dwarven enclaves, including the temple at Talhundereth.

While the ornate silver bookplate alone is valuable, what remains of the journal may be of great interest to particular scholars.

Jade Statuette.name: Jade Statuette
Jade Statuette.description: A jade statuette of a frog with tiny golden orbs for eyes.

Jeweled Gold Bracelet.name: Jeweled Gold Bracelet
Jeweled Gold Bracelet.description: A jeweled gold bracelet found amidst the bones of a sarcophagus in the Redbrands' Hideout in Phandalin.

Jeweled Silver Comb.name: Jeweled Silver Comb
Jeweled Silver Comb.description: A jeweled silver comb from @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.2NFsevkbevf8r0ZP#sister-garaeles-bargain]{Sister Garaele} at the Shrine of Luck to offer to the banshee Agatha in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoConyberryAnd]{Conyberry}.

Keg of Strong Ale.name: Keg of Strong Ale
Keg of Strong Ale.description: A keg of strong ale from the supplies being brought to Phandalin.

Ruby Eyeball.name: Ruby Eyeball
Ruby Eyeball.description: Ruby carved to look like an eyeball.

Light Feathered Quarterstaff.name: Light Feathered Quarterstaff
Light Feathered Quarterstaff.description: A thick shaft of wood wrapped with a sturdy grip makes a highly functional weapon in addition to a stout walking stick. This quarterstaff is surprisingly light and engraved with stylized feathers.

Lightbringer.name: Lightbringer
Lightbringer.description:
This weapon, known as Lightbringer, was made for a cleric of Lathander, the god of dawn. The head of the mace is shaped like a sunburst and is made of solid brass. The mace glows as bright as a torch when its wielder commands. While glowing, the mace deals an extra 1d6 damage to Undead creatures.

Foundry Notes: The additional 1d6 damage is available in the "Other" formula.

Spell Scroll of Lightning Bolt.name: Spell Scroll of Lightning Bolt
Spell Scroll of Lightning Bolt.description:
A spell scroll bears the words of a single spell, written in a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your class's spell list, you can read the scroll and cast its spell without providing any material components. Otherwise, the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell's normal casting time. Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and it crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupted, the scroll is not lost.

If the spell is on your class's spell list but of a higher level than you can normally cast, you must make a DC 12 ability check using your spellcasting ability to determine whether you cast it successfully. On a failed check, the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.

The level of the spell on the scroll determines the spell's saving throw DC and attack bonus, as well as the scroll's rarity.

Save DC: 13
Attack Bonus: +5.

A wizard spell on a spell scroll can be copied just as spells in spellbooks can be copied. When a spell is copied from a spell scroll, the copier must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence (Arcana) check. If the check succeeds, the spell is successfully copied. Whether the check succeeds or fails, the spell scroll is destroyed.

A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The lightning ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

save.condition: Spell must be on the caster's spell list.

Silver Medallion.name: Silver Medallion
Silver Medallion.description: A silver medallion displaying a lizard’s head with a quill behind it.

Marthungrim's Journal.name: Marthungrim's Journal
Marthungrim's Journal.description:
Found near a dwarf skeleton and shrine to Dumathoin, it contains the following information:

Marthungrim was a paladin of Dumathoin who excavated this home more than 60 years ago. Dumathoin tasked Marthungrim with returning spirits to rest when a crypt for the god’s faithful was corrupted.

Marthungrim learned that the crypt lies beneath a temple called Talhundereth, but the temple teemed with dangerous monsters. The crypt is protected by a lock with a puzzle that Dumathoin’s faithful could solve easier than others. (The puzzle’s answer isn’t included in the journal.)

Marthungrim planned to destroy the restless ghosts that haunt the crypt so they could rest in peace.

Badly wounded by a creature he described as “roiling heaps of tentacles,” Marthungrim returned here. His last entry describes his wounds getting worse.

Metal Tongue.name: Metal Tongue
Metal Tongue.description:
Found in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoOccludingMia.JournalEntryPage.GzuBwWdyY2ELY48g]{Occluding Miasma.}

The tongue is about 1 foot long and half as wide.

Mindblasting Cap.name: Mindblasting Cap
Mindblasting Cap.description:
Found in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh8brinymaze.JournalEntryPage.eJUjJD548m7pElFP]{B21.}

Wondrous Item, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

This soft, violet cap bears stitching in the pattern of folds on a brain.

As a bonus action while wearing the cap, you can project psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d8 psychic damage and has the &Reference[stunned] condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only. At the end of each of its turns, a stunned creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the stunned condition on itself on a success.

Once this bonus action is used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Mind Crystal.name: Mind Crystal
Mind Crystal.description:
Wondrous Item, Rarity Varies

These gemstones contain a crystallized bit of spellcasting magic. Different types of mind crystals exist, each with a different single-use effect.

When you cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action while holding a mind crystal, you can modify the spell in a specific way that has an effect described below. You can use only a single mind crystal to modify the spell, and you can’t use a mind crystal and a Metamagic option on the same spell. Once you use a mind crystal, it becomes a nonmagical gem worth 50 gp.

Careful (Uncommon). Choose up to three creatures affected by the spell. The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell.

Distant (Uncommon). If the spell has a range of 5 feet or more and doesn’t have a range of self, the spell’s range increases by 100 feet. If the spell has a range of touch, its range becomes 30 feet.

Empowered (Uncommon). When you roll damage for the spell, you can reroll up to three damage dice. You must use the new rolls.

Extended (Uncommon). If the spell has a duration of 1 minute or longer, double the spell’s duration, to a maximum duration of 24 hours.

Heightened (Rare). Choose one creature affected by the spell. That creature has disadvantage on the first saving throw it makes against the spell.

Quickened (Rare). You change the spell’s casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

Subtle (Common). You cast the spell without any somatic or verbal components for this casting.

utility.condition: When you cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action while holding a mind crystal

Mindguard Crown.name: Mindguard Crown
Mindguard Crown.description:
Wondrous Item, Very Rare (Requires Attunement)

While you wear this adamantine crown, you have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws, and you have resistance to psychic damage.

Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

Obelisk Fragment.name: Obelisk Fragment
Obelisk Fragment.description: Each of these fragments is larger than the shards in Phandalin, weighing 50 pounds and measuring more than a foot square. The fragments are supernaturally hardened and can’t be damaged by any means.

Potion of Psionic Fortitude.name: Potion of Psionic Fortitude
Potion of Psionic Fortitude.description:
Potion, Uncommon

When you drink this potion, you have advantage for 1 hour on saving throws you make to avoid or end the charmed or stunned condition on yourself.

This black potion swirls with shimmering flecks of pink and purple.

Ring of the Orator.name: Ring of the Orator
Ring of the Orator.description:
Ring, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

This ring has 6 charges. While you wear it, you can expend 1 of its charges to project your voice to be heard clearly by all creatures within 1 mile of yourself, regardless of intervening noise, for 1 minute. Magical silence, 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood blocks this projection. If you project your voice while speaking a language the listening creatures don’t understand, you can make the creatures understand what you’re saying. You must be able to see the creatures to make them understand. The ring regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn.

Scarlet Cloak.name: Scarlet Cloak
Scarlet Cloak.description: A dirty scarlet cloak worn by the Redbrand Ruffians in Phandalin.

Spell Scroll of Darkness.name: Spell Scroll of Darkness
Spell Scroll of Darkness.description:

Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

utility.condition: Spell must be on the caster's spell list.

Sildar's Longsword.name: Sildar's Longsword
Sildar's Longsword.description: A lengthy stright blade designed for slashing foes, the longsword is a highly versatile weapon that may also be wielded with two hands for more punishing strikes. It has the emblem of Neverwinter worked into its hilt.

Snow Globe.name: Snow Globe
Snow Globe.description: Snow globe containing a miniature street market.

Blessing of the Solipsistic Mind.name: Blessing of the Solipsistic Mind
Blessing of the Solipsistic Mind.description:
You access esoteric truths from an ancient tome by focusing deeply on your own thoughts. You can take an action to focus your inner mind. This focus lasts for 1 hour. While your inner mind is focused, you can’t take &Reference[reaction]{reactions.}

For the duration, when you make an Intelligence check, Wisdom check, Intelligence saving throw, or Wisdom saving throw, you can roll a d8 and add the number rolled to the ability check or saving throw. You regain the ability to focus your inner mind when you finish a long rest.

Blessing of the Solipsistic Mind.name: Blessing of the Solipsistic Mind
Blessing of the Solipsistic Mind.description: For the duration, when you make an Intelligence check, Wisdom check, Intelligence saving throw, or Wisdom saving throw, you can roll a d8 and add the number rolled to the ability check or saving throw.

Spider Staff.name: Spider Staff
Spider Staff.description:
Requires attunement by a Bard, Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard.

The top of this black, adamantine staff is shaped like a spider. The staff weighs 6 pounds. You must be attuned to the staff to gain its benefits and cast its spells.

The staff can be wielded as a quarterstaff. It deals 1d6 extra poison damage on a hit when used to make a weapon attack.

The staff has 10 charges, which are used to fuel the spells within it. With the staff in hand, you can use your action to cast one of the following spells from the staff if the spell is on your class’s spell list: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.KJRVzeMQXPj8Gtyx]{spider climb} (1 charge) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.UJJu9c2UvCzVljiP]{web} (2 charges, spell save DC 15). No components are required.

The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges each day at dusk. If you expend the staff’s last charge, roll a [[/gmroll d20]]. On a 1, the staff crumbles to dust and is destroyed.

The creature attacks with the Spider Staff.

Staff of Defense.name: Staff of Defense
Staff of Defense.description:
Requires attunement.

This slender, hollow staff is made of glass yet is as strong as oak. It weighs 3 pounds. While holding the staff, you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class.

Spells. The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can expend the requisite number of charges to cast one of the following spells from the staff: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CKZTpZlxj7hjjo2H]{mage armor} (1 charge) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]{shield} (2 charges).

The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the staff’s last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff shatters and is destroyed.

Staff of Defense: AC Boost.name: Staff of Defense: AC Boost
Staff of Defense: AC Boost.description: While holding the staff, you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class.

Statue Mucus.name: Statue Mucus
Statue Mucus.description: The mucus is bland but nutritious, and oddly mentally fortifying. Any character who ingests the liquid gains &Reference[rule=damagevulnerability]{resistance} to psychic damage for 10 minutes. The brain drippings lose their potency after 1 hour.

Mucus Fortification.name: Mucus Fortification
Mucus Fortification.description: Any character who ingests the liquid gains resistance to psychic damage for 10 minutes.

Statue's Emerald Eyes.name: Statue's Emerald Eyes
Statue's Emerald Eyes.description: An emerald eye from the statue of Dumathoin in Wave Echo Cave.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description:
Whether through demonic blessing, celestial bequeathment, crazed experiment, or skillful craft, this weapon has been enhanced to bring more bloodshed by the bearer.

This longsword rests in a dusty silver-chased scabbard and is inscribed with the name "Talon" with a hilt shaped like a bird of prey with outspread wings.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

The Granite Ledger.name: The Granite Ledger
The Granite Ledger.description:
Found in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder.JournalEntryPage.IzrwA51W0euRYVZh]{T16.}

Has metal pages and a cover made of thin plates of granite. This book is The Granite Ledger, a compendium of Talhundereth’s secrets.

Carved Wooden Pendant.name: Carved Wooden Pendant
Carved Wooden Pendant.description: A carved wooden pendant shaped like a unicorn's head found on a skeleton in the bottom of the crevasse in the Redbrand's Hideout.

Urmon's Journal.name: Urmon's Journal
Urmon's Journal.description:
The journal of an adventurer named Urmon, found in the Redbrand's Hideout and written in Dwarvish. It conveys the following information:

More than five hundred years ago, clans of dwarves and gnomes made an agreement known as the Phandelver Pact, by which they would share a rich mine in a wondrous cavern known as Wave Echo Cave. In addition to its mineral wealth, the mine contained great magical power. Human spellcasters allied themselves with dwarves and gnomes to channel and bind that energy into a great forge called the Forge of Spells, where magic items could be crafted. Times were good, and the nearby town of Phandalin prospered as well. But disaster struck when bandits swept through the North and laid waste to all in their path.

A powerful bandit force reinforced by evil mercenary wizards attacked Wave Echo Cave to seize its riches and magic treasures. Human wizards fought alongside their dwarf and gnome allies to defend the Forge of Spells, and the ensuing spell battle destroyed much of the cavern. Few survived the cave-ins and tremors, and knowledge of the location of Wave Echo Cave was lost.

Vial of Perfume.name: Vial of Perfume
Vial of Perfume.description: A fragrant commodity typically used by the wealthy.

Wooden Pipe.name: Wooden Pipe
Wooden Pipe.description: A wooden pipe adorned with platinum filigree.

Unrefined Iron Ore.name: Unrefined Iron Ore
Unrefined Iron Ore.description: Thirty pounds of this unrefined ore is sufficient raw material for a skilled smith to produce @UUID[Item.IoJIJdOLKSpminMe]{seven iron ingots} worth 25 gp each.

Flayer Slayer.name: Flayer Slayer
Flayer Slayer.description:
Weapon (Greataxe), Rare (Requires Attunement)

Carvings of decapitated mind flayers adorn this greataxe’s metal blade.

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this greataxe.

An Aberration hit with this greataxe takes an extra 1d12 slashing damage. If the Aberration is currently grappling a creature, the Aberration must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or release each creature it is grappling.

Spell Scroll: Tongues.description:

If the casting is interrupted, the scroll is not lost.

Tongues (Level 3)

This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears. Moreover, when the target speaks, any creature that knows at least one language and can hear the target understands what it says.

Scroll Details

Potion of Climbing.name: Potion of Climbing
Potion of Climbing.description:
The potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. During this time, you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb.

Luminous Daylight.name: Luminous Daylight
Luminous Daylight.description:
A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point on the war pick you choose. The sphere is bright light and sheds dim light for an additional 60 feet.

If you chose a point on an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the light shines from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the affected object with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the light.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created the darkness is dispelled.

Gem of Brightness.name: Gem of Brightness
Gem of Brightness.description:
Wondrous item

This prism has 50 charges. While you are holding it, you can use an action to speak one of three command words to cause one of the following effects:

  • The first command word causes the gem to shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. This effect doesn't expend a charge. It lasts until you use a bonus action to repeat the command word or until you use another function of the gem.
  • The second command word expends 1 charge and causes the gem to fire a brilliant beam of light at one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become blinded for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
  • The third command word expends 5 charges and causes the gem to flare with blinding light in a 30- foot cone originating from it. Each creature in the cone must make a saving throw as if struck by the beam created with the second command word.

When all of the gem's charges are expended, the gem becomes a nonmagical jewel worth 50 gp.

Well Made Shortsword.name: Well Made Shortsword
Well Made Shortsword.description: A medium sized blade with a firm crossguard and a leather-wrapped handle. A versatile weapon which makes up in versatility what it lacks in reach. Its pommel and guard are set with semiprecious stones.

Thieves' Tools.name: Thieves' Tools
Thieves' Tools.description: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.
